short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Healthy attention span and reinforcement learning.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your attention span and retention by quizzing yourself when watching videos on YouTube.

This is an extension for YouTube that helps you improve your attention span and retention by providing quizzes while you watch videos.

Whether you're watching educational content, tutorials, or entertainment, MindTube helps you stay engaged and reinforces your learning by prompting you with questions related to the video.

---
How to Get Started

Install MindTube: Add the MindTube extension to your Chrome browser from the Chrome Web Store.
Create an account: Sign up for a free account to get started.
Watch Videos: Open any video on YouTube and start watching.
Take Quizzes: Interactive quizzes appear during the video, you can customize the quiz to be intrusive or at the end of the video.
